verses.text: \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* ye the \w lamb|strong="H3733"\w* to the \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* from \w Sela|strong="H5554"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, unto the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.\f + \fr 16.1 \ft Sela: or, Petra: Heb. A rock\f*

For it shall be, \add that\add*, as a \w wandering|strong="H5074"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w* cast \w out|strong="H7971"\w* of the \w nest|strong="H7064"\w*, \add so\add* the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall be at the \w fords|strong="H4569"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*.\f + \fr 16.2 \ft cast…: or, a nest forsaken\f*

\w Take|strong="H0935"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H6415"\w*; \w make|strong="H7896"\w* thy \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* as the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*; \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* the \w outcasts|strong="H5080"\w*; \w bewray|strong="H1540"\w* not him that \w wandereth|strong="H5074"\w*.\f + \fr 16.3 \ft Take: Heb. Bring\f*

Let mine \w outcasts|strong="H5080"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* with thee, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; \w be|strong="H1933"\w* thou a \w covert|strong="H5643"\w* to them from the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w spoiler|strong="H7703"\w*: for the \w extortioner|strong="H4160"\w* is at an \w end|strong="H0656"\w*, the \w spoiler|strong="H7701"\w* \w ceaseth|strong="H3615"\w*, the \w oppressors|strong="H7429"\w* are \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 16.4 \ft extortioner: Heb. wringer\f*\f + \fr 16.4 \ft the oppressors: Heb. the treaders down\f*

And in \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* shall the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* be \w established|strong="H3559"\w*: and he shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon it in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w judging|strong="H8199"\w*, and \w seeking|strong="H1875"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w hasting|strong="H4106"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*.\f + \fr 16.5 \ft established: or, prepared\f*

¶ We have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; \add he is\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w proud|strong="H1341"\w*: \add even\add* of his \w haughtiness|strong="H1346"\w*, and his \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*, and his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*: \add but\add* his \w lies|strong="H0907"\w* \add shall\add* not \add be\add* so.

Therefore shall \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* for \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, every one shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*: for the \w foundations|strong="H0808"\w* of \w Kir-hareseth|strong="H7025"\w* shall ye \w mourn|strong="H1897"\w*; surely \add they are\add* \w stricken|strong="H5218"\w*.\f + \fr 16.7 \ft mourn: or, mutter\f*

For the \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w languish|strong="H0535"\w*, \add and\add* the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* of \w Sibmah|strong="H7643"\w*: the \w lords|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* have broken \w down|strong="H1986"\w* the principal \w plants|strong="H8291"\w* thereof, they are \w come|strong="H5060"\w* \add even\add* unto \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*, they \w wandered|strong="H8582"\w* \add through\add* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: her \w branches|strong="H7976"\w* are stretched \w out|strong="H5203"\w*, they are gone \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 16.8 \ft stretched…: or, plucked up\f*

¶ Therefore I will \w bewail|strong="H1058"\w* with the \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* of \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w* the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* of \w Sibmah|strong="H7643"\w*: I will \w water|strong="H7301"\w* thee with my \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, O \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and \w Elealeh|strong="H0500"\w*: for the \w shouting|strong="H1959"\w* for thy summer \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w* and for thy \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft the shouting…: or, the alarm is fallen upon, etc\f*

And \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* is taken \w away|strong="H0622"\w*, and \w joy|strong="H1524"\w* out of the plentiful \w field|strong="H3759"\w*; and in the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* there shall be no \w singing|strong="H7442"\w*, neither shall there be \w shouting|strong="H7321"\w*: the \w treaders|strong="H1869"\w* shall tread \w out|strong="H1869"\w* no \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* in \add their\add* \w presses|strong="H3342"\w*; I have made \add their vintage\add* \w shouting|strong="H1959"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*.

Wherefore my \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* shall \w sound|strong="H1993"\w* like an \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* for \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and mine inward \w parts|strong="H7130"\w* for \w Kir-haresh|strong="H7025"\w*.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when it is \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* is \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* on the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*, that he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to his \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* to \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*; but he shall not \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* concerning \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* since that \w time|strong="H0227"\w*.

But now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Within \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, as the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of an \w hireling|strong="H7916"\w*, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* shall be \w contemned|strong="H7034"\w*, with all that \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*; and the \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w* \add shall be\add* \w very|strong="H4592"\w* \w small|strong="H4213"\w* \add and\add* \w feeble|strong="H3808"\w*.\f + \fr 16.14 \ft feeble: or, not many\f*
